Translations.Text: (he nabee!) kaho ki main insaanon ke paalanahaar kee sharan mein aata hoon
jo saare insaanon ka svaamee hai
jo saare insaanon ka poojy hai
bhram daalane vaale aur chhup jaane vaale (raakshas) kee buraee se
jo logon ke dilon mein bhram daalata rahata hai
jo jinnon mein se hai aur manushyon mein se bhee
